original_text: with the following letter: “The brothers, both the apostles and the elders, to the brothers who are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia, greetings.
korean_text: 그 편에 편지를 부쳐 이르되 사도와 장로 된 형제들은 안디옥과 수리아와 길리기아에 있는 이방인 형제들에게 문안하노라

sentences.original_text: The brothers, both the apostles and the elders,
to the brothers who are of the Gentiles
in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia,
